Title: Directs the New York state energy research and development authority to establish a pilot program to install a microgrid in Glenwood Houses
Summary: Directs the New York state energy and research development authority to establish a pilot program to install a microgrid in Glenwood Houses; requires the authority to annually report on the results of such program and any recommendations for expansion.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to directing the New York state energy research and development authority to establish a pilot program to install a microgrid in Glenwood Houses
